allow: Bash("I:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\18\bin\psql" -U postgres -d sw_inventory -c "SELECT id, name, code FROM vendors LIMIT 5;" -t)

Bash("I:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\18\bin\psql" -U postgres -d sw_inventory -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_software FROM software;" -t)
Bash("I:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\18\bin\psql" -U postgres -d sw_inventory -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_versions FROM software_versions;" -t)
Bash("I:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\18\bin\psql" -U postgres -d sw_inventory -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_lpars FROM lpars;" -t)

Bash(find src/routes -type f -name "*.server.ts" -exec sed -i 's/db\.customer\./db.customers./g; s/db\.vendor\./db.vendors./g; s/db\.lpar\./db.lpars./g; s/db\.package\./db.packages./g; s/db\.packageItem\./db.package_items./g; s/db\.lparSoftware\./db.lpar_software./g' {} ;)
Bash("I:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\18\bin\psql" -U postgres -d sw_inventory -c "SELECT id FROM software LIMIT 1" -t)
Bash("I:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\18\bin\psql" -U postgres -d sw_inventory -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as lpar_count FROM lpars;" -t)
Bash(for file in src/routes/vendors/new/+page.svelte src/routes/software/new/+page.svelte src/routes/packages/new/+page.svelte src/routes/lpars/new/+page.svelte)

Bash("I:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\18\bin\psql" -U postgres -d sw_inventory -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as vendors FROM vendors; SELECT COUNT(*) as customers FROM customers; SELECT COUNT(*) as software FROM software; SELECT COUNT(*) as lpars FROM lpars; SELECT COUNT(*) as lpar_software FROM lpar_software;" -t)

Bash("I:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\18\bin\psql" -U postgres -d sw_inventory -c "SELECT ''Vendors:'' as type, COUNT(*)::text as count FROM vendors UNION ALL SELECT ''Customers:'', COUNT(*)::text FROM customers UNION ALL SELECT ''Software:'', COUNT(*)::text FROM software UNION ALL SELECT ''LPARs:'', COUNT(*)::text FROM lpars UNION ALL SELECT ''LPAR Software:'', COUNT(*)::text FROM lpar_software;" -t)
